name: Aqua Dig DX
description:
Aqua Dig DX is a remake / remaster of the classic J2ME game, Aqua Dig.

It comes with smoother gameplay and controls, new items, and more.

There is a ton of new stuff planned for future updates, so stay tuned!

CONTROLS:
W - A - S - D to move / dig
Q - E to select an item (top-right corner)
SHIFT to use the selected item
ESC to pause game / go back
SPACE to select things in menus
